articles.description: PARIS: For decades Asia's most wanted man, French serial killer Charles Sobhraj, terrorised the continent with a string of murders in the 1970s that targeted tourists. The man nicknamed "the Serpent" was freed on health grounds from prison in Nepal on Friday.…
articles.content:
1944: BORN IN ASIA
